value.title: How to use Jupyter Notebooks in Azure Data Studio | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Vicky Harp joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Data Studio combined the simple and robust SQL query editing experience of tools like SSMS with the flexibility and collaboration of Jupyter Notebooks. The November 2019 release of Azure Data Studio included SQL Server 2019 Guide as a Jupyter Book, which
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pHuRj9ty9cI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Implement serverless APIs with Azure Functions and Azure API Management | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can quickly deploy and manage your Serverless API's using OpenAPI and API Management.  0:00 – Overview 0:40 – OpenAPI definition (fka Swagger) 2:15 – Using API Management to build an OpenAPI definition 3:48 – Reviewing the generated OpenAPI definition

value.title: Improve security with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sarah Young joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Sentinel, which is a scalable, cloud-native, security information event management (SIEM) and security orchestration automated response (SOAR) solution. Azure Sentinel delivers intelligent security analytics and threat intelligence across the enterprise,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oiWInLYvnUk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement.

value.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
value.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Find out to use Azure Queue storage to handle high demand and improve resilience in your distributed applications.

value.title: Communicate effectively on GitHub by using Markdown
value.excerpt: Learn to use Markdown to communicate with brevity, clarity, and expression.

value.title: Connect to virtual machines through the Azure portal by using Azure Bastion
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Bastion to securely connect to Azure Virtual Machines directly within the Azure portal.

value.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

value.title: Orchestrate machine learning with pipelines
value.excerpt: Create pipelines in Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
value.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

value.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
value.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!

value.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
value.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Develop and configure an ASP.NET application that queries an Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Create an Azure SQL database to store data for an application, and create an ASP.NET application to query data from the database.

value.title: Introduction to enterprise-scale landing zones in the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: The Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure provides many landing zone options. In this module, we'll focus on enterprise-scale landing zones.

value.title: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles
value.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles

value.title: Enterprise-scale architecture operational design principles
value.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture operational design principles

value.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore data ingestion in Azure
